name: The Minotaur's Labyrinth
author: Urban Minotaur
bootlegger: There are two storytellers. One cannot lie, and one cannot tell the truth. Players are not told which is which.
Whenever a good player would receive information due to their ability, they must choose which storyteller to consult.
Evil players receive their information as normal.
Both storytellers must always tell the truth about mechanical or rules questions.
The mathematician's ability also includes players who receive false information due to the Bootlegger.
